name:
LEGO® Marvel Avengers:
Update
description:
This Patch application will take LEGO® MARVEL’s Avengers to v1.2.0 to add support for E-Commerce in the game.

v1.1.0

• Prevented the player from respawning locked in the cargo container when crashing Lola into the water.

• Fixed several mission scripts on the HUB levels not always firing correctly preventing their completion.

• Several rare memory crashes throughout the game addressed.

• Several UI fixes throughout the game.

• Localized text and audio fixes.
